column1: [[File:The Hobbit - The Battle of the Five Armies - Ravenhill.jpg|thumb|300px|Azog's Ravenhill command post in ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'']]'''Ravenhill''' was an outlying hill beneath the height of [[Lonely Mountain|Erebor]]
column2: the [[Lonely Mountain]].  It stood at the end of a ridge of high ground extending southwards from the mountain itself
column3: overlooking the [[River Running]] and the valley of [[Dale]].<ref name=door>{{H|Doorstep}}</ref>

column1: The [[Dwarves of Erebor]] built a guard-post on the hill
column2: about five hours march from the [[Front Gate]] to the Mountain
column3: <ref>{{H|Home}}</ref> and above its chamber for many years lived friendly intelligent [[ravens]]
column6: that gave it its name.<ref name="Gathering">{{H|Gathering}}</ref>

column1: In {{TA|2941}}<ref>{{App|TA}}</ref> [[Thorin and Company]] made their first camp north of the hill as they reached Erebor.<ref name=door/>  Much later the Company returned to Ravenhill when they made their escape from the Mountain.  After spending one night in the rock chamber on the hill the thrush that they had last seen on the "Doorstep" came to them.  When [[Balin]] wished that it was a raven the thrush flew off and brought back [[Roäc]]
column2: who gave them the news of the death of [[Smaug]] and the approach of the [[Elves]] and [[Lake-men]].<ref name="Gathering"/>

column3: and [[Bilbo Baggins]] took a stand on Ravenhill.<ref>{{H|Burst}}</ref>  Knocked senseless
